title: Ep. 221 Alexander Reiss: How To Make Money During This Correction
itunes:title: Alexander Reiss: How To Make Money During This Correction
description:
On this week's S&A Investor Radio podcast, we have two great guests.
 
Matt Badiali, editor of the S&A Resource Report, starts the show off by sharing his inside scoop to the resource industry.
 
Matt says after three straight years of declines – gold stocks finally look attractive. He tells us how investors should approach this volatile industry and shares his favorite stocks to buy and one bellwether to avoid.
 
Find out why Matt says we are seeing the first steps to what is to become a tremendous Renaissance in Mexican oil production... 
 
Our second guest, Alexander Reiss, Director of Equity Research at Stifel Nicolaus, joins us to discuss closed-end funds. 
 
You will hear him explain why these vehicles are much better buys than traditional mutual funds. He also discusses how some closed-end bond funds provide safer and higher yields than traditional investments. 
 
Plus, what are the drawbacks to CEFs?
 
You'll never guess!
